text: Ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala'e potana payagambarana svapnane sacum kari didhum ke in sa'a allaha tame kharekhara salamatipurvaka masjide haramamam pravesa karaso, manthana vala kadhata ane manthana vala kapavata, (santi sathe) nidara banine, te (allaha) te karyone jane che jene tame nathi janata, basa! Tene a pahela eka najikani jita tamane api
